== ASUS M2N-E NVIDIA nForce® 570 Ultra™ MCP ==

<nowiki>[[http://www.asus.com/products.aspx?l1=3&l2=101&l3=308&l4=0&model=1181&modelmenu=1|Manufacturer's page]]</nowiki>

=== Gutsy Gibbon ===

==== i386 ====
----
Installed Kubuntu 7.10 Gutsy Gibbon Desktop. Live CD ran without errors from a USB CD drive. Installation went smoothly without any errors. Everything works "out of the box". This is a lightning-fast board at an economy price.

==== What was tested ====
----
* Audio Line Out port (speakers and headset)
* Dual channel RAM
* 10/100/1000 Mbps wired ethernet LAN
* On-board sound
* PCI Express x16 slot
* PS2 keyboard
* SATA hard drive
* USB CD drive
* USB mouse

==== What wasn't tested ====
----
* Audio Rear Speaker port
* Audio Center/Subwoofer port
* Audio Line In port
* Audio Microphone port
* Audio Side Speaker Out port
* IDE
* PATA drive
* SATA raid drives
* Sound recording.
* PCI Express slot
* PCI Express slots
* PCI slots
----
